医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现生酮饮食有望治疗焦虑、抑郁和其他精神健康障碍研究表明，生酮饮食可能有助于控制焦虑、抑郁、压力、精神分裂症和双相情感障碍，但需要更多的临床试验来证实其功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-treating-anxiety-depression-and-other-mental-health-disorders-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Ketogenic-diet-shows-promise-in-treating-anxiety-depression-and-other-mental-health-disorders-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bad967d0-651e-4b1d-b29a-4f42ddce669d Thu, 23 May 2024 20:30:00 -0400 Ketogenic diet shows promise in treating anxiety, depression, and other mental health disorders, study finds
研究发现，产前双语接触可提高婴儿的言语敏感性研究人员发现，产前接触母语会影响新生儿对语音的神经编码，双语接触会增强对更广泛频率范围的敏感性。这表明早期的语言环境从出生起就塑造了听觉处理能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Prenatal-bilingual-exposure-boosts-babies-speech-sensitivity-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Prenatal-bilingual-exposure-boosts-babies-speech-sensitivity-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b160e74f-ece5-477d-8909-0b06d2469015 Thu, 23 May 2024 20:22:00 -0400 Prenatal bilingual exposure boosts babies' speech sensitivity, study finds
小鼠研究发现父亲接触 PFAS 会扰乱后代的基因表达研究表明，雄性小鼠在怀孕前接触 PFAS 会改变精子甲基化，并影响其后代肝脏和脂肪中的基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Mouse-study-finds-PFAS-exposure-in-fathers-disrupts-offsprings-gene-expression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Mouse-study-finds-PFAS-exposure-in-fathers-disrupts-offsprings-gene-express.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccd0b032-f05a-4a77-91c8-fd89380d652f Thu, 23 May 2024 19:58:00 -0400 Mouse study finds PFAS exposure in fathers disrupts offspring's gene expression
樱桃和浆果：天然的心脏健康甜蜜疗法研究论文回顾了樱桃和浆果中酚类化合物对心血管的益处，强调了它们在减少炎症、氧化应激和改善血脂方面的潜力。经常食用这些水果可以显着降低患心血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Cherries-and-berry-Naturee28099s-sweet-remedy-for-a-healthy-heart.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Cherries-and-berry-Naturee28099s-sweet-remedy-for-a-healthy-heart.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=402f8455-374c-46f3-a026-9218b3d8738e Thu, 23 May 2024 19:31:00 -0400 Cherries and berries: Nature’s sweet remedy for a healthy heart
新研究显示，富含类黄酮的饮食可将 2 型糖尿病风险降低高达 28%根据营养与糖尿病杂志的一项研究，增加富含类黄酮的食物的摄入量可以显着降低患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Flavonoid-rich-diet-slashes-type-2-diabetes-risk-by-up-to-2825-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Flavonoid-rich-diet-slashes-type-2-diabetes-risk-by-up-to-2825-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=717e9373-8afa-4842-9ca2-b8d3e9f6a94d Thu, 23 May 2024 19:00:00 -0400 Flavonoid-rich diet slashes type 2 diabetes risk by up to 28%, new study reveals
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：反堕胎强硬派大声疾呼随着堕胎成为 11 月选举的关键问题，联合起来推翻罗伊诉韦德案的运动在是否走得更远、更快——包括惩罚堕胎者和禁止避孕或试管受精方面存在分歧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Anti-abortion-hard-liners-speak-up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Anti-abortion-hard-liners-speak-up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8237d07-3f95-4248-b83c-d6859b3210f4 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:28:00 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Anti-abortion hard-liners speak up
研究发现，母亲大麻使用障碍与儿童自闭症风险较高有关《精神病学研究》的一项研究表明，母亲大麻使用障碍会显着增加后代患自闭症谱系障碍（ASD）的风险。产前接触大麻的儿童的风险高出 3.5 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-higher-autism-risk-in-children-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Maternal-cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-higher-autism-risk-in-children-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a18b5131-3c37-4fe1-8f51-6c81a30a7917 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:26:00 -0400 Maternal cannabis use disorder linked to higher autism risk in children, study finds
定制聚合物胶束以改善奥拉帕尼溶解度和药物释放奥拉帕尼是一种选择性聚（ADP-核糖）聚合酶抑制剂。然而，其临床应用受到低溶解度和不良药代动力学特征（例如相对较短的循环）的阻碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Tailoring-polymeric-micelles-for-improved-olaparib-solubility-and-drug-release.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Tailoring-polymeric-micelles-for-improved-olaparib-solubility-and-drug-release.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5dd1e999-ad18-447e-ad1f-4aadb659ec8b Thu, 23 May 2024 16:24:23 -0400 Tailoring polymeric micelles for improved olaparib solubility and drug release
综述：意义未明的异型性甲状腺结节的临床治疗细针抽吸细胞学 (FNAC) 是一种经济高效的甲状腺结节治疗技术。世界卫生组织甲状腺肿瘤分类的变化可能会影响细胞学的可靠性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Review-Clinical-management-of-tropical-nodules-with-atypia-of-undependent-significance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Review-Clinical-management-of-tropical-nodules-with-atypia-of-undependent-significance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09aee6f9-99bd-491e-8ed3-e6d37ebcf7d2 Thu, 23 May 2024 16:21:14 -0400 Review: Clinical management of thyroid nodules with atypia of undetermined significance
研究发现参加癌症临床试验并没有显着的生存获益参与癌症临床试验通常表明生存率有所提高，但考虑到偏差的高质量研究显示没有显着的生存益处。由于混杂因素，试验效益可能被夸大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-finds-no-significant-survival-benefit-from-participating-in-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240523/Study-finds-no-significant-survival-benefit-from-participating-in-cancer-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70aa0250-9b2a-43b2-b730-19c1d084bf8e Thu, 23 May 2024 16:19:00 -0400 Study finds no significant survival benefit from participating in cancer clinical trials
